pkgmetadata.longdescription: Neutrosophic Distributions // Computes the pdf, cdf, quantile function and generating random numbers for neutrosophic distributions. This family have been developed by different authors in the recent years. See Patro and Smarandache (2016) doi:10.5281/zenodo.571153 and Rao et al (2023) doi:10.5281/zenodo.7832786.
